## $\mathrm{Bib\TeX}$ citations 

:::: {layout="[40,60]"}

::: first

Only affects *in text* references and bibliography citations...

```yaml
---
title: "citations"
output: pdf_document
date: "2024-04-05"
bibliography: quake.bib                # <1>
csl: "apa.csl"                         # <2>
---
```
1. Include references **within any type of document** by creating and referencing a `.bib` file

2. Specify citation format **within any type of document** by referencing the associated `.csl` file

## [`papaja`](https://frederikaust.com/papaja_man/r-markdown-components.html#yaml-front-matter)

``` yaml
---
title             : "The title"
shorttitle        : "Title"

author: 
  - name          : "First Author"
    affiliation   : "1"
    corresponding : yes    # Define only one 
    address       : "Postal address"
    email         : "my@email.com"
    role:         # Contributorship roles 
      - Conceptualization
      - Writing - Original Draft Preparation
      - Writing - Review & Editing
  - name          : "Ernst-August Doelle"
    affiliation   : "1,2"
    role:
      - Writing - Review & Editing

affiliation:
  - id            : "1"
    institution   : "Wilhelm-Wundt-University"
  - id            : "2"
    institution   : "Konstanz Business School"
    
authornote: |
  keep space/indent

  Enter author note here.

abstract: |
  keep space/indent
  
  <!-- https://tinyurl.com/ybremelq -->
  
keywords          : "keywords"
wordcount         : "X"

bibliography      : ["r-references.bib"]

floatsintext      : no
figurelist        : no
tablelist         : no
footnotelist      : no
linenumbers       : yes
mask              : no
draft             : no

documentclass     : "apa6"
classoption       : "man"
output            : papaja::apa6_pdf
---    
```
